entry.title: his debut solo album
entry.content: ... that Geordie Greep announced his debut solo album just ten days after revealing that his band was on an indefinite hiatus?

entry.title: Renato Candida
entry.content: ... that Renato Candida, not the assassinated general Carlo Alberto dalla Chiesa, inspired the character of Captain Bellodi in The Day of the Owl?

entry.title: The Patient's Playbook
entry.content: ... that The Patient's Playbook warns against overly hasty medical treatment, citing a case in which a man received heart stents before learning that the issue was in his lungs?

entry.title: Smin Maw-Khwin
entry.content: ... that two successive Hanthawaddy commanders who held the title of Smin Maw-Khwin surrendered to Ava forces in 1414?

entry.content: ... that a house that was once called "almost the opposite of a landmark" later became a U.S. National Historic Landmark?

entry.title: Off the Beaten Path
entry.content:
Off the Beaten Path

Andorra la Vella

Andorra la Vella is the capital of a quirky co-principality lodged in the mountains between Spain and France that offers great skiing, hiking, and lots of duty-free shopping.

entry.title: Destination of the Month
entry.content:
Destination of the Month

Kowloon

One of the most densely populated cities on Earth, Hong Kong's mainland portion offers a culture less influenced by the British than the neighboring Island, plus accommodation, dining, and nightlife are generally cheaper.
